contentrichtext.text: See Related changes for recent changes to these computing topics which have proved controversial. Please add any other controversial articles you're aware of. Please watch and use the talk page to get notified of any articles which need peer review. *[[Abstraction (computer science)]] *[[Class (computer science)]] *[[Class (object-oriented programming)]] *[[Inheritance (computer science)]] *[[Inheritance (object-oriented programming)]] *[[Object-oriented programming]] *[[Thread (computer science)]] *[[Window class]] *[[Reference (computer science)]] *[[Method (computer science)]] concepts apparently merged from other articles, which then disappear into redirects. *[[Composition (computer science)]] *[[Aggregation (object-oriented programming)]] this is an empty page, right now, but it is a concept in OOP etc. *[[Association (object-oriented programming)]] another OOP concept which might pop up.
